<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Ticket page in HR Service Portal shows fields that are configured in HR Case Header Configuration(sn_hr_core_case_config'). HR Services need to select the particular configuration in order to show fields. There are two configuration fields in HR Services that point to 'sn_hr_core_case_config' table. - header_config_subject_person : Configuration for the Subject Person or Task Assignee. - header_config_opened_for : Configuration for Opened For or Approver.
This Fix script sets the configuration fields inside HR Services to default CORE OOB Configurations. For Onboarding HR Service, the configuration fields are set to default Onboarding OOB Configuration.</description> <name>Set HR Services configuration to default</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[new sn_hr_core.hr_ServiceConfigUtil().setDefaultsForService();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-08-18 01:07:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>059f3b4b53600300eb7c0a1806dc34c2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set HR Services configuration to default</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Employee Center Core" source="sn_hr_sp">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center Core">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_059f3b4b53600300eb7c0a1806dc34c2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-10-31 19:20:29</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
